sentence: Great location clean comfortable and GREAT view of the River and French Quarter from the lobby
Location securty comfort loby was nice and we used it Pool was pretty nice Aquarium Riverwalk IMAX casino Jackson Square Canal St shopping short walk to Bourbon Royal St restaurants River views
Its on perfect location by the canal boundary of french quarter and business center with a perfect view of the Mississippi River by the 11th floor lobby
Loved the lobby and rooftop pool
This place is near the waterfront really nice view from the lobby
large spacious lobby high ceilings large rooms comfortable beds Walking distance to French Quarter Aquarium Levee walk Convention Center gambling casino restaurants shops museums parks
The Lobby is Incredible and you will want to spend your entire day enjoying a drink overlooking the best part of NOLA
Reception lobby was amazing
Location staff very helpful and friendly2 elevators to get to room
From the beauty of the lobby to the comfortable bed in the room everthing was wonderful
Locating the elevators was difficult
Missing amenities and high cost
And no info on the hotel amenities Etc

Overall I liked the hotel although a few things I did not likechecking in two trainees were at the counter and had difficulties with the check in process do not really like having to take an elevator to the 11th floor to check in and then a different elevator to access room on 18th floor was confusing workout room better than many I have encountered hotel was clean and staff friendly and close to areas I visited or places I needed to go but it is a bit of a monster sized structure see above See above
I think that the information about the hotel lobby being on the 11th floor should be on the website
The room was very basic and lacked simple amenities like adequate coffee supply
In a nutshell the New Orleans facility is far below par
The number of elevators you have to utilize can seem cumbersome at first but it is very easy to acclimate to using
David at the ground floor level at the valet entrance was beyond rude
Unwelcoming only one Elevator working customer service almost non existent
